metadata.title: CVE-2024-6329 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 8.16 prior to 17.0.6, starting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.4, and startingfrom 17.2 prior to 17.2.2, which causes the web interface to fail to renderthe diff correctly when the path is encoded.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
